downloadTitle: Microsoft Lync Server 2010 Administration Guide & Windows PowerShell Supplement
downloadDescription: The Lync Server Administration Guide and the Windows PowerShell Supplement contain procedures and guidance for administering a Lync Server 2010 deployment.
detailsSection: On this page, you can download documents that contain procedures and guidance for administering a Lync Server 2010 deployment. The Lync Server Administration Guide (LS_Admin.doc) covers procedures that you can perform using the Lync Server Control Panel and some command-line procedures. The Windows PowerShell Supplement (LS_Admin_Windows_PowerShell_Supplement.doc) contains guidance for using Windows PowerShell cmdlets to perform management tasks at the command line. You can download the individual files, or the .zip file that contains both documents.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or choose a different language from the drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
